description: Open UI, AllTheFreeStock, HTML DOM, Magic Link, Flowify, Lisan and more...

items.title: Open UI
items.description: An open-source project to maintain a standard for UI and to promote its adherence and adoption.

items.title: AllTheFreeStock
items.description: A large list of free stock images, videos, music and more.

items.title: HTML DOM
items.description: A big list of vanilla JS scripts for the most common DOM interactions.

items.title: Magic
items.description: A cool project to add passwordless logins to your website.

items.title: Flowify
items.description: A browser extionsion for creating free flowing startpages.

items.title: Vuln Cost
items.description: A cool VS Code extension to show in-line how many vulnerabilities a package contains.

items.title: Pluralsight #FreeApril
items.description: Pluralsight is offering all of their video courses for free this april.

items.title: Lisan
items.description: A fast i18n library for adding multiple languages to your application.

items.title: How to SSH Properly
items.description: A good guide about SSH by Gus Luxton on Gravitational.
